name: Tape Tale
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!! EMBEDDED VERSION CUTS OFF SOME OF THE VISIBLE AREA.

Retrieve the stolen mixtape from the earless enemies in Tape Tale. Use pencils to rewind broken cassettes and use their tape to travel around the levels. A challenging platformer where you can test your jumping skills and muscle memory.

This is the first time I'm participating in a Game Jam, had tons of fun creating this prototype!

Asset Credits:

-Music / Sound Effects Recording & Mixing by me.

-Art / Animation / Coding by me.

Thanks to the following free resources I used to make it playable before deadline:

-Adriano Veríssimo : Enemy Blob art.

-Fesliyan Studios : Jump Ding SFX.

-Jason Yang  : My tape effect became possible learning through his verlet integration video. Really helpful!

Every asset was made from scratch during Brackeys Jam 2020.2 (theme "Rewind").
